article_title: Editorial: Southern politicians and the Confederate battle flag
article_text:
Donald Trump, the presumptive Republican presidential nominee, is considering his options for a vice president. Among them are Sen. Jeff Sessions, R-Alabama, former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley and New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie. Which of these possibilities do you prefer?

You voted:

article_metadata.author: the editorial board of The Anniston Star

og.description: The Confederate battle flag is rapidly exiting state property across the South this week for much the same reason it was raised in those locales between 50 and 60 years
